pkgmetadata.longdescription: Markov Random Field Structure Estimator // Three algorithms for estimating a Markov random field structure.Two of them are an exact version and a simulated annealing version of a penalized maximum conditional likelihood method similar to the Bayesian Information Criterion. These algorithm are described in Frondana (2016) doi:10.11606/T.45.2018.tde-02022018-151123.The third one is a greedy algorithm, described in Bresler (2015) doi:10.1145/2746539.2746631).
